name: Consensual Chaos
description:
Winner of the GXDev 2015 Volume Award for Loudest & Proudest Game!

Make offers to try to maximize enjoyment and minimize awkwardness, while not ignoring your partners desires.

Developed as an entry for GXDev, the majority of the development occurred in a 24 hour period, with cleanup the following week.

Programming by Jim Otermat, Design by Alexei Othenin-Girard. Silhouette art by Cherry Cupid. Additional art by Jim & Alexei. Sound design by Jim. Specific songs licensed under Creative Commons and listed on the credits page in game.
